Pre-Game Insights: Experts predict a close game between the Guardians and the Royals with the Guardians favored to win with a 53% chance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is scheduled to start at 7:40 p.m. ET at Kauffman Stadium in Kansas City, Missouri.
The Guardians are listed as -134 moneyline favorites in this matchup against the Royals (+114).
Cleveland is the run-line favorite (-1.5). An 8-run over/under is set for the matchup.
Others: The Royals have won 31 times this season when listed as underdogs, and 11 times when listed as at least +114 or worse on the moneyline.
Jose Ramirez paces the Guardians with 34 home runs and 105 runs batted in.
Bobby Witt Jr. paces the Royals in home runs (30), runs batted in (97) and has posted a team-best batting average of.338.
